articles.title: LOFAR super-telescope reveals the far reaches of the universe - Euronews
articles.description: The largest pan-European radio-frequency telescope offers a unique eye for exploring the far reaches of the universe. #SmartRegions

articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: Falling asteroid sparks brilliant fireball over Europe just hours after discovery (video) - Space.com
articles.description: It's just the seventh time that astronomers spotted a small body in space before it entered our planet's atmosphere.
articles.content:
A dramatic fireball lit up European skies just hours after its discovery in space.
Krisztián Sárneczky spotted the small asteroid at Konkoly Observatory's Piszkéstető Station, located some 60 miles … [+3986 chars]

articles.title: Moldova president says Russia plotted to topple gov't - CTV News
articles.description: Moldova's President outlined Monday what she described as a plot by Moscow to use external saboteurs to overthrow her country's government, put the nation 'at the disposal of Russia' and derail its aspirations to one day join the European Union.
articles.content:
